kpi.name: M1031C0

kpi_info.title: MAX NUMBER OF HSDPA USERS PER WBTS
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of simultaneous HSDPA users per WBTS. In this context ""HSDPA user"" means a user whose HS-DSCH serving cell is located in the BTS, regardless of whether the uplink is Rel99 or E-DCH. UPDATED:The number of HSDPA users is sampled with one-second interval.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAX NUMBER OF HSDPA USERS PER WBTS
